炗字的基本解释

炗
guāng
古同“光”。

炗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guāng］
［《廣韻》古黄切，平唐，見。］
亦作“灮1”。“炗1”的今字。
(1)光线。
(2)光明；明亮。
(3)色泽。
(4)指神采。
(5)光亮；光滑。
(6)发扬。
(7)照耀。
(8)指三光。日、月、星。
(9)光阴，时光。
(10)景色。
(11)希望，苗头。
(12)荣耀；荣宠；光彩。
(13)使增光彩。
(14)华美。
(15)敬辞，表示光荣。
(16)《诗·小雅·蓼萧》：“既見君子，爲龍爲光。”俞樾《群经平议·毛诗三》：“爲龍爲光，猶云爲龍爲日，並君象也……此言遠國之君朝見於天子，故曰'既見君子，爲龍爲光'。龍光，並以天子言也。”后用以指皇帝的容颜。
(17)指礼乐文物。
(18)血的别称。
(19)空；净尽。
(20)裸露。
(21)瞪，睁大。
(22)好处。
(23)仅仅；只是。
(24)通“廣”。广阔。
(25)通“廣”。充满。
(26)通“廣”。大。
(27)通“廣”。远。

炗字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　炗； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页667第22
【玉篇】古文灮字。註詳儿部四畫。

炗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
炗字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Crust
guāng
The ancient same "light".
Crust
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guāng］
["Guangyun" ancient yellow cut, Ping Tang, see. ]
Also known as "灮1". The present character of "炗1".
(1) Light.
(2) Bright; bright.
(3) Color.
(4) Refers to the spirit.
(5) Bright; smooth.
(6) Carry forward.
(7) Shine.
(8) Refers to Sanko. Sun, moon, star.
(9) Time, time.
(10) Scenery.
(11) Hope, signs.
(12) Glory; honorable pet; brilliance.
(13) To add brilliance.
(14) Gorgeous.
(15) Respect speech, expressing honor.
(16) "Poetry·Xiaoya·Liaoxiao": "When you see a gentleman, you are the dragon and the light." Yu Yue's "Quan Jingping Discussion·Mao Poem III": "The dragon is the light, and the clouds are the dragon and the sun. And the image of the emperor is also... This is the saying that the emperor of a distant country is seen in the emperor, so it is said that "when you see a gentleman, you are a dragon and light." Longguang also speaks of the emperor." Later, it was used to refer to the emperor's face.
(17) Refers to cultural relics of rituals and music.
(18) Another name for blood.
(19) Empty; net exhausted.
(20) Nudity.
(21) Stare, wide open.
(22) Benefits.
(23) Only; just.
(24) Through "Guang". broad.
(25) Through "Guang". full.
(26) Through "Guang". Big.
(27) Through "Guang". far.
